bulkImport.title: Bulk Import
bulkImport.description: Import identity data from CSV files.
bulkImport.formatCsv: Format your CSV file (max %{maxImportSize}MB) according to the following:
bulkImport.matchUsingHelp: Select one or more properties for unique record match.
bulkImport.cancelImportDescription: Are you sure you want to cancel your import? If you cancel, pending records will not be processed.
bulkImport.selectIdentity: Select the managed identity object into which you want to import your CSV identities.
bulkImport.deleteImportConfirmation: If you delete this import the entries imported will remain, but import record will be deleted from the list.

passwordPolicy.title: Password Policy
passwordPolicy.subtitle: Define password rules for identities.
passwordPolicy.recommended: Recommended Settings based on NIST guidelines
passwordPolicy.restrictRepetitive: Restrict sequential and repetitive characters (e.g. 12345 or aaaaaa)
passwordPolicy.restrictCommon: Restrict commonly used passwords (e.g. p@ssw0rd, etc.) and dictionary words
passwordPolicy.restrictCommonHelp: To add restricted passwords to the dictionary file download the file, make changes, and reupload modified file.
passwordPolicy.restrictAttributes: Password cannot include part of {resourceName} attributes
passwordPolicy.restrictForbidden: Cannot use a password containing forbidden characters
